java.lang.Object

Logger, org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
Direct Known Subclasses:
StartInMemDBMojo, StopInMemDBMojo
public abstract class AbstractInMemDBMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
implements Logger

Abstract base class for all the In Memory Database plug-in's Mojos.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Brian Matthews
